Name: 遊んで将棋が強くなる！ 銀星将棋DX2
About the game: Shogi software with functions that even beginners can enjoy. In addition to playing games, there is a 'shogi class' where you can learn basic rules. With 3 million joseki, 17 levels of difficulty setting, and various other functions, you can enjoy shogi from beginners to advanced players. [There are Various Game Modes] ・ 'Normal game' where you can freely enjoy shogi such as playing against a computer, 2P game, checking the game record, and inputting the game record. ・ 'Rating Game' to understand Your Own Ability. 　You can understand your strength by playing against a computer whose level is close to your strength. ・ 'Shogi Dojo' to Play Against 9 Characters. 　Characters with unique fighting styles will appear. ・ 'Shogi class' where you can learn the basics of shogi and tesuji problems. 　Characters from the Shogi Dojo will appear and explain about Shogi. ・ 'Tsume shogi' that can challenge a total of 150 questions. 　It contains a wide range of questions, from simple to difficult. ・ 'Enclosure / Tactical Encyclopedia' where you can see the explanation of the enclosure / tactics 　You can learn about enclosures and strategies. [Abundant Beginner Support Functions] ・ A wide range of difficulty adjustments in 17 levels from 'Beginner' to '4th dan'! 　The strength of '15th grade' and '13th grade' is suitable for beginners' practice. ・ 'Two-choice hint' to choose the correct answer from two choices! ・'The dominant display of pieces' that displays the effect range of pieces in an easy-to-understand color-coded shogi board! ・ 'Analysis function' to look back on what went wrong! ・ 'Introductory piece' that shows how to move pieces at a glance! ・ Display the 'enclosure / tactics' used during the game! [There are various other functions] ・ 'Handicap' that adjusts the difference in ability by changing the number of pieces. ・ 'Position graph' that displays the condition of the board in an easy-to-understand manner. ・ 'Check warning / Check effect' to display the opponent's check. ・ 'Use of joseki' with 3 million hands recorded. ・ 'Movement range display of pieces' that makes it easy to understand where to move. ・ 'Display of steps and streaks' that makes it easy to understand the position of the squares. ・ 'Save Kifu' that can save up to 100 game results. ・ 'Kifu Playback' that allows you to check the saved game record. ・ 'Kifu Input' that allows you to freely enter a game record. ・ 'Reading voice' that informs the movement of the piece by voice. etc. There are many other useful features. Have fun learning and become stronger!
Developers: 株式会社シルバースタージャパン
Publishers: 株式会社シルバースタージャパン
